Tavatron followed closely behind Prowl and Iron Raptor as the group 
exited the base. She snarled softly under her breath. Run?! Warriors 
didn't run from battle! Tavatron turned so that she was walking 
backwards and facing the 'escort' so to speak. Then again...

"I am ready to run when you are."

She then turned so she was walking forward again, her pace picking up 
slightly. She wanted out of this situation, now.
